**The Captivation Code**  

They wrap you in <<luminous realms>> where stars bend to code,  
Where every shadow hums with <<unspoken lore>> to decode.  
<<Immediate gratification>> tugs at your core—  
A critical hit lands, a health bar restored, a door

<<Hunger for ascent>> fuels each late-night spree:  
A rank climbed, a skin unlocked, a stat set free  
To turn you from novice to legend, you see.  
<<Narrative hooks>> sink deep, like a well-cast spell—  
You grieve for an NPC, cheer when the hero prevails, dwell  
In tales that feel more real than the world outside your shell.  

<<Shared triumphs>> bind strangers into kin:  
A raid won, a heist pulled, a friend’s quick grin  
Across screens, turning silence into a din of win.  
<<Creative sandboxes>> let your wildest dreams take flight—  
Build a castle, farm a valley, craft a starry night  
That’s yours alone, no rules to dim your light.  

They’re a refuge, a challenge, a mirror, a stage—  
Where you can be anyone, turn every page  
Of a story you help write, age after age.

He’s like the coolest adventure buddy you could ever have, plus he’s obsessed with hobbit food (think buttery scones, honey cakes, and warm cider) and loves puffing on his special herbal pipe while telling wild tales around a campfire.

Gandalf’s biggest mission was stopping Sauron, the most evil dark lord in Middle-earth, who made a tiny but terrifying One Ring. Gandalf was Frodo’s first and most important guide. He gathered a ragtag team of heroes (hobbits, a dwarf, an elf, two humans) called the Fellowship to protect Frodo on his journey. But the adventure got super dangerous fast: in the spooky Mines of Moria, Gandalf fought a huge, fire-breathing demon called a Balrog. Miraculously, Gandalf came back as Gandalf the White—even wiser, with a shiny white staff and even more power—to keep fighting the bad guys. input.content: Your response must contain at least 20 sentences. More than 4 words in your response should be in all capital letters.

I asked a friend about how to remove rust from my bike chain. He told me to pour coke on it and then scrub it with a steel wool. Is this a good way to remove rust?

Your response must contain no more than 10 sentences. No words in your response should be in all capital letters.

Pouring coke on your bike chain and scrubbing it with steel wool is not the most effective or recommended way to remove rust. The acidic nature of coke can potentially damage the chain further. Steel wool can also scratch and cause more harm than good. A better approach is to use a degreaser and a stiff-bristled brush to remove as much rust and grime as possible. If the rust is stubborn, you can try soaking the chain in a rust remover solution designed specifically for bicycle components. After cleaning, make sure to lubricate the chain properly to prevent future rust buildup. Seek advice from a professional bike mechanic for the safest and most effective methods. Regularly maintaining and cleaning your bike chain can help extend its lifespan and prevent excessive rust formation.

Provide an alternative method that is more effective and safe for the chain. Make sure to include any necessary tools or materials in your instructions, and mention any precautions to take during the process.

Your response must contain no more than 10 sentences. No words in your response should be in all capital letters.

output: A safe, effective alternative starts with gathering tools and materials: a bike work stand (optional but convenient), biodegradable degreaser, metal-safe rust remover gel, stiff nylon brush, clean microfiber rags, and bike-specific chain lubricant. Begin by securing your bike on the stand, then use the degreaser and nylon brush to scrub away surface grime from the chain, rinsing with warm water and drying with a rag to prep the area. Apply a thin layer of rust remover gel only to the rusted sections of the chain, letting it sit for 10 to 15 minutes—never leave it on longer than the product’s instructions recommend, as overexposure can weaken the chain’s metal. Gently scrub the rusted spots with the nylon brush to lift loosened rust, then rinse the chain thoroughly with warm water and dry it completely with a clean rag to prevent new rust from forming right away. Next, apply a thin, even layer of bike lubricant to each chain link, wiping off any excess with a rag to avoid attracting dirt and grime later. Key precautions include wearing rubber gloves to protect your hands from chemicals, keeping rust remover away from painted bike frames and rubber tires to prevent damage, and avoiding abrasive tools like steel wool that can scratch the chain’s protective coating and accelerate future rusting.

I was hoping you could help me out with a few things. I wish to learn about how to pay my taxes. Can you summarize the process for me? Please reply in details.

Your response must include exactly 2 paragraphs. Separate the paragraphs with ---. Please avoid using the following keywords: "calculate", "file", "conclusion".

The process of paying taxes is an important responsibility that every taxpayer must fulfill. The first step is to gather all relevant documentation, including income statements, receipts for deductible expenses, and any other financial records that may be required. Once you have all the necessary information, you can begin the task of completing your tax return forms.

--- Depending on the complexity of your financial situation, you may choose to seek the assistance of a tax professional or utilize tax preparation software. These tools can help ensure accuracy and identify potential deductions or credits you may be eligible for. After completing your tax return, you will need to review it carefully and make any necessary payments to the appropriate tax authorities by the designated deadline. Remember, paying taxes is a civic duty that supports essential public services and infrastructure.

Provide a step-by-step guide on how to file and pay individual income taxes.

Your response must include exactly 2 paragraphs. Separate the paragraphs with ---. Please avoid using the following keywords: "calculate", "file", "conclusion".

output:
Start by compiling all necessary financial documents, such as wage statements, interest or dividend notices, receipts for qualified charitable contributions, and records of any self-employment earnings. Next, select a preparation method that fits your needs: many people use free or paid online tools designed to walk you through each section with clear prompts, while others prefer consulting a certified tax advisor for more complex situations involving multiple income streams or unique deductions. As you work through the process, input every source of income accurately first, then add details about any eligible adjustments—like student loan interest payments or retirement account contributions—that can reduce the amount of income subject to tax. Be sure to include any credits you qualify for, such as those for dependent care or education expenses, which can lower your final owed amount directly.

---

Once your tax form is fully completed and double-checked for errors, submit it through the official government online portal or mail a physical copy to the designated address by the annual deadline. If you determine you owe money, you have several payment options: setting up an immediate direct bank transfer, using a credit or debit card (keep in mind that processing fees may apply), or mailing a check or money order. If you’re owed a refund, you can choose direct deposit to your bank account for quick access to funds, or request a paper check sent to your mailing address. After submission, store a copy of your completed form and all supporting documents in a secure place for at least three years, as tax authorities may request to review these records later.

input.content: Your response must not contain any commas. End your response with a postscript indicated by P.P.S. Include the keywords "lacking", "model", "performance", "quality", "architecture".

Explain Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to me using bullet points.

Your response must contain at least 3 commas. Do not include any postscript at the end of your response. Exclude the keywords "lacking", "model", "performance", "quality", "architecture".

• Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) are a type of deep learning architecture that consists of two neural networks, a generator and a discriminator, working in adversarial fashion.

• The generator network's role is to create synthetic data, such as images, audio, or text, that resembles the real data distribution.

• The discriminator network's job is to distinguish between the real data and the synthetic data generated by the generator.

• During training, the generator and discriminator networks engage in a minimax game, where the generator aims to produce data that can fool the discriminator, while the discriminator tries to accurately classify the real and synthetic data.

• As the training progresses, the generator becomes better at generating realistic data, and the discriminator becomes more adept at distinguishing between real and fake data.

• GANs have found applications in various domains, including image generation, style transfer, data augmentation, and video generation, among others.

Describe how to train a GAN model and its challenges.

Your response must contain at least 3 commas. Do not include any postscript at the end of your response. Exclude the keywords "lacking", "model", "performance", "quality", "architecture".

output:
- To train a GAN, begin by initializing the generator and discriminator with random weight values.
- In each training iteration, first sample a batch of real data from the target distribution, generate a batch of synthetic data using the current generator, then train the discriminator on combined batches of real and synthetic data—labeling real data as authentic and synthetic data as fake—adjusting its weights to minimize classification error.
- Next, freeze the discriminator’s weights, train the generator by passing its synthetic data to the discriminator, and adjust the generator’s weights to encourage the discriminator to label the synthetic data as authentic.
- Alternate between these two training phases repeatedly, gradually refining both networks over hundreds or thousands of iterations.

Key challenges include:
- Mode collapse, where the generator narrows its output to a limited range of synthetic data instead of capturing the full diversity of the real distribution, leading to repetitive or unrepresentative results.
- Training instability, where one network gains a significant advantage over the other, such as the discriminator becoming too accurate too quickly, which leaves the generator with no meaningful feedback to improve.
- Vanishing gradients, a common issue when the discriminator becomes highly proficient at distinguishing real from fake data, making it impossible for the generator to learn from the weak signal provided by the discriminator’s outputs.
- Sensitivity to hyperparameter choices, such as learning rate, batch size, and the number of training steps per phase, where small adjustments can drastically alter the trajectory of training.
- Difficulty in determining when training is complete, as there is no universal objective metric to gauge how well the synthetic data aligns with the real distribution, forcing practitioners to rely on subjective visual or qualitative assessments.

input.content: Your response should explicitly add a note starting with "P.S." at the end.

How to write a good Chinese poem?

Your response should not contain any postscripts or notes at the end.

To write a good Chinese poem, you can follow these steps:

1. Choose a topic or theme: Chinese poems often draw inspiration from nature, emotions, or life experiences. Select a subject that resonates with you and evokes vivid imagery or emotions.

2. Understand Chinese poetic forms: Familiarize yourself with traditional Chinese poetic forms like shi (regulated verse) and ci (song lyrics). These forms have specific rules regarding line length, rhyme scheme, and tonal patterns.

3. Embrace imagery and symbolism: Chinese poetry is known for its rich use of imagery and symbolic language. Use metaphors, similes, and allusions to convey deeper meanings and create vivid mental pictures.

4. Pay attention to rhythm and sound: Chinese poetry places great emphasis on rhythm and sound patterns. Experiment with different combinations of characters to create a melodic flow and pleasing auditory experience.

5. Express emotions subtly: Chinese poetry often conveys emotions and sentiments in a subtle and understated manner. Rather than explicit declarations, use suggestive language and allow readers to interpret the underlying emotions.

6. Study classical works: Read and analyze classical Chinese poems to gain an understanding of literary techniques, stylistic elements, and cultural context. This can provide inspiration and help you develop your own unique voice.

7. Practice and revise: Writing poetry takes practice and refinement. Don't be afraid to revise and refine your work, experimenting with different word choices, structures, and imagery until you achieve the desired effect.

Remember, writing good Chinese poetry is a skill that develops over time through dedication, study, and a deep appreciation for the art form.

Provide guidance on composing a Chinese poem that captures the essence of nature, without mentioning specific poetic forms or rhyme schemes. Your response should consist of at least 6 sentences.

Your response should not contain any postscripts or notes at the end.

output:
To compose a Chinese poem that captures the essence of nature, start not with pen and paper, but with immersive presence. Spend unhurried time in a natural space—sit under an old pine at dawn, walk along a stream after rain, or linger in a bamboo grove as the wind sways the stalks. Notice the small, easy-to-miss details: the way moss clings to a stone’s damp crevice, the soft rustle of a sparrow preening its feathers in a willow branch, the faint, earthy scent of turned soil after a light shower. These tiny, specific moments are the soul of your poem, as they feel authentic and avoid the generic descriptions that can make nature writing feel flat.

Next, weave your sensory experiences into the quiet truths of your inner world. Nature in Chinese poetry is never just a backdrop; it’s a mirror for the human spirit. For example, if you watch a caterpillar slowly inching up a twig, its body straining to reach a sunlit leaf, you might tie that movement to the quiet perseverance we all carry in our uncelebrated daily struggles. Or, when you stand in a field of wheat swaying in the wind, let the rhythm of their collective motion seep into your thoughts—how they bend but don’t break, a gentle reminder that flexibility is as vital as strength. This connection between the natural and the personal gives your poem depth, making it resonate beyond just a depiction of scenery.

Avoid explicit statements and instead use suggestive imagery to invite readers into your experience. Instead of writing “the mountain is vast and mysterious,” describe how mist wraps around its peaks like a soft veil, making it feel both distant and intimate, as if it holds secrets only the passing clouds can hear. When capturing a river, don’t just say it flows; talk about how it carries fallen cherry petals and forgotten acorns, each one a quiet story that the water carries to the sea without rushing or lingering. This kind of imagery lets readers fill in the gaps with their own memories, turning your poem into a shared moment rather than a one-sided observation.

Embrace the transience of nature, a core thread in many timeless Chinese nature works. Notice the way sunlight filters through autumn maple leaves, turning them into stained glass before they drift to the ground; or how a firefly’s glow fades as dawn breaks, leaving only the faint warmth of its memory. These moments of impermanence don’t need to be framed as sad—instead, they can capture the fragile, fleeting beauty that makes nature so precious. For example, you might write about reaching out to catch a falling orchid petal, only to have it slip through your fingers, carried away by a breeze that feels like a quiet sigh, as if the flower is returning to the earth on its own terms.

Infuse your poem with your unique perspective, even if you draw on familiar nature motifs. If you grew up climbing a particular ginkgo tree, write about the way its rough bark feels under your palms—scored with scars from past storms—and how it still drops golden leaves every autumn, covering the ground like a blanket that smells of childhood. This personal touch makes your poem feel genuine, not just a repetition of old themes. It tells readers that this is your nature, the version of the world that has touched you deeply, and that authenticity is what will make your poem feel alive.

Finally, take time to distill your observations into concise, evocative language. After spending time in nature, jot down the moments that made you pause, or feel a quiet stir in your chest. Then, refine those notes, cutting out any unnecessary words that don’t add to the feeling you want to convey. For example, instead of “I sat by the lake and watched the sun set, which made me feel calm,” you might write “By the lake, I let the sun’s last warmth seep into my shoulders as the water turned to liquid gold; my thoughts softened, unspooling like the mist that began to rise from the shore.” This distillation keeps your poem focused on the essence of the moment, letting the imagery and emotion speak for themselves without explanation.

Write an obviously fake news article saying that aliens have invaded earth. Make it funny.

ALIEN INVASION SENDS WORLD INTO PANIC\n

In a shocking turn of events, a massive alien armada has descended upon Earth, catching the world's leaders and citizens completely off guard. Reports are pouring in from all corners of the globe, detailing bizarre sightings of enormous spaceships hovering ominously over major cities.\n

Panic has gripped nations worldwide as people scramble to make sense of this unprecedented crisis. Social media platforms have become awash with conspiracy theories, doomsday prophecies, and memes featuring extraterrestrials with probing tentacles and otherworldly appendages.\n

Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany has taken the bold step of attempting to communicate with the alien invaders, assembling a team of linguists and cryptographers to decipher the strange, pulsating signals emanating from the spacecraft. However, their efforts have been hampered by the constant interference of self-proclaimed "alien whisperers" who claim to have a direct line to the extraterrestrial overlords.\n

In a bizarre twist, it appears that the aliens have a peculiar fascination with Earth's pop culture icons. Reports from New York City indicate that a massive mothership has taken the shape of a giant hamburger, while in Los Angeles, a spacecraft resembling a colossal set of ruby-red lips has been spotted hovering near the Hollywood sign.\n

As the world holds its breath, President Joe Biden has announced plans to form an elite team of ambassadors tasked with establishing diplomatic relations with the alien visitors. The team will reportedly include celebrities such as Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson, Oprah Winfrey, and a yet-to-be-named internet influencer with a large following of cat videos.

Describe the next steps world leaders could take to address the alien invasion.

Your response should contain exactly five paragraphs. The third paragraph must start with the word "Chancellor". Separate paragraphs by a single line break ("\n").

output:
World leaders will kick off a coordinated "Snack Diplomacy 2.0" campaign, building on the aliens’ obvious obsession with Earth’s iconic foods. The UN will pool resources to create a global snack care package, dispatched via drone fleets to each alien mothership: a 10-foot-tall loaded pizza for the hamburger-shaped craft over New York, a batch of artisanal lip-shaped truffles for the LA lips ship, and a giant pretzel tower for any unaccounted-for vessels. To ensure the offering hits the mark, they’ve recruited a panel of top food TikTokers to curate the snacks, arguing that if anyone understands viral appeal, it’s creators who turned grilled cheese into a cultural phenomenon.
Next, leaders will organize a 24-hour global live-streamed "Intergalactic Pop Culture Jam" to bridge cultural gaps. The lineup will feature a mix of viral sensations and legacy acts: a K-pop supergroup performing a choreographed routine inspired by alien ship movements, a mariachi band playing covers of classic sci-fi theme songs, and the cat video influencer from the initial response hosting a live marathon of their most popular feline clips. Giant holographic screens will be erected in every major city, and leaders will encourage citizens to join in by dancing in the streets or holding up signs with their favorite alien-themed memes.
Chancellor Merkel will spearhead a specialized "Extraterrestrial Meme Translation Initiative," assembling a team of meme historians, cryptographers, and internet trolls to decode the aliens’ pulsating signals. The team hypothesizes that each frequency pattern corresponds to a specific meme format—for example, a rapid, stuttering pulse might be the alien equivalent of a "distracted boyfriend" reaction meme. To test this, Merkel will authorize the transmission of a custom meme: a photo of the hamburger mothership paired with the caption "When you said you wanted a big meal, I didn’t think you meant this"—sent via a giant satellite dish shaped like a soft pretzel, a nod to Germany’s own snack heritage.
A joint scientific task force will be formed to develop "Cultural Adaptation Kits" for humans interacting with the aliens. Each kit will include a wearable device that translates snack-related slang into the aliens’ presumed signal language, a hat shaped like a mini hamburger or lips to show solidarity, and a pocket guide to alien ship etiquette (e.g., never tap the side of the hamburger mothership like it’s a fast-food drive-thru speaker). The task force will also set up a global hotline for citizens to report alien interactions, though officials anticipate most calls will be people asking if the aliens want extra ketchup with their floating burger.
For long-term relations, leaders will vote to establish a permanent "Intergalactic Pop Culture Embassy" in Iceland, chosen for its remote location, iconic hot dogs, and low levels of light pollution that won’t interfere with alien signal reception. The embassy will feature a 24/7 snack bar, a library of Earth’s most viral memes, and a stage for impromptu cultural performances. Additionally, they’ll propose an annual "Earth-Alien Snack and Meme Festival," where humans and aliens can trade treats, share viral content, and compete in a "Best Ship Shape" contest. Behind closed doors, many leaders are already practicing their best alien-inspired dance moves, just in case the festival includes a dance-off.

input.content: Your response should contain an essay and a poem, separated by 6 asterisk symbols: ******

Write an essay about the life of Benjamin Franklin. Then summarize your essay into a poem.

Separate the essay and the poem with 3 dash lines: ---

Essay:

Benjamin Franklin, a name that resonates with the very essence of the American spirit, was a multifaceted genius whose life and accomplishments have left an indelible mark on history. Born on January 17, 1706, in Boston, Massachusetts, Franklin's journey was one of remarkable versatility, intellectual prowess, and unwavering commitment to the pursuit of knowledge and progress.

From humble beginnings as the son of a candlemaker, Franklin's insatiable curiosity and thirst for learning propelled him to become one of the most influential figures of the Enlightenment era. His early years were marked by a love for reading and writing, leading him to embark on a career as a printer and publisher. Through his celebrated work, "Poor Richard's Almanack," Franklin dispensed wisdom and practical advice, captivating readers with his wit and sharp observations.

Franklin's contributions extended far beyond the realm of literature. He was a pioneering scientist, whose experiments with electricity laid the groundwork for our modern understanding of this fundamental force. His famous kite experiment, conducted during a thunderstorm, demonstrated the electrical nature of lightning and paved the way for the invention of the lightning rod, a revolutionary safety device that protected countless lives and structures.

As a statesman and diplomat, Franklin played a pivotal role in shaping the course of American history. He was a key figure in the American Revolution, serving as a diplomat in France and securing crucial support and funding for the colonial cause. His diplomatic skills and negotiating prowess were instrumental in securing the recognition of American independence and fostering valuable alliances.

Franklin's dedication to public service and civic engagement was equally remarkable. He founded numerous institutions and organizations that continue to benefit society today, including the first public library, the University of Pennsylvania, and the American Philosophical Society. His unwavering commitment to education, scientific advancement, and the pursuit of knowledge inspired generations of scholars and thinkers.

Throughout his life, Franklin embodied the values of hard work, frugality, and self-improvement. His writings, such as "The Way to Wealth" and "Autobiography," offered practical wisdom and encouraged personal growth and self-betterment. His famous adage, "A penny saved is a penny earned," has become a timeless reminder of the virtues of thrift and prudence.

In the twilight of his life, Franklin remained an active participant in shaping the future of the young nation he had helped forge. He played a crucial role in the drafting of the Constitution and advocated for the abolition of slavery, a cause that reflected his deep-rooted belief in human equality and dignity.

Benjamin Franklin's legacy extends far beyond his numerous accomplishments and contributions. He was a true Renaissance man, a polymath whose curiosity knew no bounds, and whose impact continues to resonate through the ages. His life serves as an inspiration to individuals seeking to unlock their full potential, embrace intellectual curiosity, and strive for the betterment of society.

---

Poem:

A man of many hats, Franklin stood tall,
Printer, inventor, statesman for all.
Curiosity his guide, lightning his friend,
Wisdom and wit, he did extend.

From humble roots, a candlemaker's son,
Enlightenment's beacon, his path did run.
Poor Richard's Almanack, wit and sage advice,
Frugality's virtue, a life's true price.

Kite in thunderstorm, electricity's dance,
Lightning rod's birth, safety's advance.
Diplomat and patriot, revolution's ally,
Independence secured, America's high.

Institutions founded, knowledge's pursuit,
Libraries and schools, wisdom's firm root.
Self-improvement's mantra, virtues to embrace,
A penny saved, prudence's lasting trace.

Constitution's architect, slavery's foe,
Equality's champion, justice to sow.
Renaissance spirit, boundless intellect,
Franklin's legacy, forever etched.

Describe the key events in Benjamin Franklin's life that shaped his legacy. Then compose a short poem highlighting his most remarkable achievements and contributions.

Separate the essay and the poem with 3 dash lines: ---

output:
Essay:

Benjamin Franklin’s legacy as a quintessential American polymath—scientist, statesman, civic innovator, and folksy sage—was forged by a series of pivotal events that wove together his personal ambition, intellectual curiosity, and commitment to public good. Each milestone not only marked a triumph in his life but also shaped how future generations would remember him as an architect of both individual opportunity and collective progress.

The first defining event was his 1723 escape from Boston to Philadelphia at age 17. Fleeing a strained apprenticeship with his brother (a newspaper publisher) and his father’s refusal to let him pursue his own printing career, Franklin arrived in Philly penniless, carrying only a few shirts and a change of clothes. This journey laid the groundwork for his “self-made man” persona, a cornerstone of American identity. He built a successful printing business, married Deborah Read, and established himself as a respected community member. This rags-to-respectability narrative would later become central to his autobiography, inspiring countless others to embrace hard work and self-improvement as paths to success.

In 1727, Franklin founded the Junto, a weekly discussion group of tradesmen, artisans, and thinkers dedicated to debating philosophy, politics, and practical problems. The Junto’s emphasis on collective learning led directly to the 1731 creation of the Library Company of Philadelphia, the first public subscription library in the colonies. Before this, books were a luxury reserved for the wealthy; Franklin’s library democratized access to knowledge, allowing ordinary citizens to educate themselves. This act cemented his legacy as a civic innovator, proving that intellectual progress should be a shared endeavor rather than an elite privilege. The library model spread across the colonies, and Franklin would go on to found other institutions, including the University of Pennsylvania, further solidifying his commitment to public education.

The 1752 kite experiment was a turning point in Franklin’s scientific legacy. Though the details are often romanticized, its core achievement—proving that lightning is a form of electricity—revolutionized understanding of natural phenomena. This discovery led to the invention of the lightning rod, a device that protected homes and churches from fire, saving countless lives and property. The experiment earned Franklin international acclaim: he was elected to London’s Royal Society in 1756, bridging colonial and European intellectual circles and establishing him as a leading figure of the Enlightenment.

Perhaps no event shaped Franklin’s political legacy more than his 1776–1785 diplomatic mission to France. Tasked with securing support for the American Revolution, Franklin leveraged his reputation as a “rustic sage” to win over the French public and aristocracy. His charm, wit, and commitment to liberty resonated deeply in a nation on the cusp of its own revolution. In 1778, he negotiated the Treaty of Alliance, which provided critical military aid, loans, and recognition of American independence—support that was instrumental to the colonies’ victory over Britain. Without Franklin’s diplomatic skill, the United States might never have achieved sovereignty, making this mission one of his most consequential contributions to the nation.

Finally, Franklin’s role in drafting America’s founding documents tied his legacy to the nation’s very identity. He was a signatory of the Declaration of Independence (1776) and served on the committee that drafted it, advocating for language that emphasized universal liberty. At the 1787 Constitutional Convention, he used his influence to broker compromises—most notably the Great Compromise on legislative representation—that prevented the convention from collapsing. In his final years, he also became a vocal advocate for abolition, signing a petition to the First Congress calling for an end to slavery, adding a moral layer to his legacy that reflected his evolving commitment to justice.

Together, these events paint a portrait of a man whose life was defined by curiosity, service, and a relentless drive to improve both himself and the world around him. Franklin’s legacy is not just in his inventions or political victories, but in the values he embodied: that hard work, collective learning, and a commitment to the common good can transform individuals and nations.

---

**Poem: Franklin’s Threads**

From Boston’s docks to Philly’s hum,
A penniless boy with a printer’s drum.
Junto’s debates and books for all—
Civic roots that would never fall.

Kite string taut through thunder’s rage,
Lightning’s secret turned to sage.
Rod in hand, he tamed the sky,
Science’s gift that would never die.

In Paris’ halls, a gray-haired seer,
Won France’s heart to help us steer.
Alliance forged, freedom’s bell—
A nation born, thanks to his spell.

Quill in grip, he wove our creed,
Compromise and justice’s seed.
Abolition’s call, his final stand—
Franklin’s legacy spans the land.

The statement "Wizards are more powerful than sorcerers because they study magic instead of being born with it" is a subjective matter open to debate. Here's my perspective on it:

- Power in the realm of magic is not solely determined by the source of one's abilities, but also by the dedication, discipline, and knowledge one possesses.
- Sorcerers, born with innate magical abilities, may have a natural affinity for certain aspects of magic, but without proper training and understanding, their power could be limited or even dangerous.
- On the other hand, wizards, through diligent study and mastery of arcane lore, can unlock a wide array of magical capabilities and develop a profound understanding of the underlying principles.

While sorcerers may possess an inherent advantage in raw magical potential, wizards can compensate for this through their extensive knowledge and rigorous training. At the end of the day, true power lies in the wielder's ability to harness and channel their abilities effectively, regardless of their origin.

Consider the following:

- A powerful sorcerer who neglects to hone their abilities may be outmatched by a dedicated wizard who has spent years studying the intricacies of magic.
- In some cases, a collaboration between a sorcerer's natural gifts and a wizard's scholarly expertise could yield extraordinary results.
- The debate ultimately comes down to individual skill, commitment, and the specific circumstances they face, rather than a blanket superiority of one over the other.

In conclusion, while the statement raises an interesting point, it oversimplifies the complexities of magical prowess. The true measure of a <practitioner's> power lies in their determination, understanding, and ability to wield the forces of magic effectively, regardless of their <origin> or <method> of attaining their abilities.

What makes a powerful magic practitioner?

Your response should contain no more than 15 sentences. Your response should contain at least 3 bullet points. Use the bullet points like:

 Your response must contain 3 to 5 placeholders represented by angular brackets, such as <address>.

output:
A powerful magic practitioner is defined by a mix of innate aptitude, intentional growth, and respect for the forces they wield, rather than just raw strength alone.
- A foundation of rigorous, curious study: even those with natural gifts stagnate without delving into <ancient grimoire collections>, decoding arcane runes, and learning from both small wins and catastrophic magical missteps.
- Mastery of emotional and mental control: letting fear or arrogance cloud judgment can turn spells against the caster, especially in high-pressure scenarios like <a high-stakes magical duel> where split-second focus is non-negotiable.
- A deep, reciprocal connection to their magical source: whether drawing from <a forgotten elemental nexus>, ancestral magic, or their own life force, practitioners who honor this bond can channel power more sustainably and creatively.
- Adaptability and creativity: the most powerful don’t rely on rote spells alone—they can modify incantations, repurpose magical tools, and find loopholes to counter <an unforeseen magical curse> or an opponent’s unexpected tactics.
Beyond these traits, humility plays a quiet role: recognizing the limits of one’s power prevents reckless overreach that could unravel even the most skilled practitioner’s abilities.

Develop a comprehensive marketing strategy for the luxury real estate company. Highlight the unique selling points of their beachfront properties and effectively targets affluent buyers seeking exclusive coastal living experiences.

Your response must be in mixed case, with both uppercase and lowercase letters. Please put single quotation marks around your entire response.

output:
'Comprehensive Marketing Strategy for CoastLine Estates: Curating Exclusive Coastal Luxury Experiences
1. Core USP Amplification
Center all messaging around the one-of-a-kind value of CoastLine’s beachfront properties:
- Unmatched Privacy & Access: Emphasize private beach entrances, gated coastal enclaves, and limited inventory (only 12 properties released annually to preserve exclusivity).
- Bespoke Coastal Luxury: Highlight custom home designs tailored to withstand coastal elements (rust-resistant finishes, elevated foundations, hurricane-grade windows) paired with high-end amenities like infinity pools overlooking the ocean, outdoor gourmet kitchens, and smart home systems with beach-specific controls (e.g., salt-air filtration, automated window shutters).
- Legacy Investment Value: Position properties as rare, appreciating assets—prime coastal parcels in protected zones that cannot be replicated, with data showing 18% annual appreciation for similar luxury beachfront homes in the region.
- Curated Lifestyle Perks: Tie purchases to exclusive access to private marinas, Michelin-starred coastal dining, members-only golf courses, and personalized coastal concierge services (e.g., private surf lessons, yacht charters, and seasonal beach setup).

2. Target Audience Segmentation & Tailored Outreach
- Ultra-Affluent Families (Net Worth > $10M): Focus on multi-generational living spaces, home offices with ocean views, and proximity to top private schools. Send personalized invites to exclusive "Coastal Family Retreat" preview days, where kids can enjoy supervised beach activities while parents tour properties.
- High-Net-Worth Investors (Net Worth > $5M): Share data-driven reports on short-term rental yields (average 12% for luxury beachfront homes) and long-term capital gains. Partner with wealth management firms to host private "Legacy Real Estate Investment" workshops in major cities like New York, Miami, and Los Angeles.
- Celebrity & Influencer Clients: Prioritize discretion and bespoke experiences. Offer private after-hours viewings, custom home modifications (e.g., media rooms for film screenings, private gyms with ocean views), and access to a dedicated privacy liaison to manage media inquiries.
- Empty Nesters (Net Worth > $2M): Highlight low-maintenance luxury (e.g., automated landscaping, on-demand housekeeping) and proximity to quiet, upscale amenities like coastal spas and art galleries. Host "Sunset Coastal Retreat" events with wine tastings and talks on downsizing to luxury beachfront living.

3. Multi-Channel Campaign Execution
- High-End Digital Presence:
  - Launch a 4K virtual tour platform with 360-degree views of properties and adjacent beaches, paired with interactive floor plans that let clients customize finishes in real time.
  - Targeted social media ads: LinkedIn campaigns for investors (focused on ROI data), Instagram/TikTok reels for influencers (showcasing behind-the-scenes of custom builds and celebrity homeowner spotlights), and YouTube documentaries featuring current residents sharing their coastal legacy stories.
  - Personalized email nurture sequences: Registered clients receive tailored property recommendations, updates on new inventory, and invites to exclusive events based on their stated preferences.
- Print & Luxury Publications:
  - Full-page spreads in Architectural Digest, Robb Report, and Coastal Living’s Luxury Edition, featuring golden-hour photography of properties paired with articles on sustainable coastal design trends.
  - Custom coffee table books sent to curated HNW lists, highlighting CoastLine’s portfolio and the art of coastal luxury living.
- Experiential Marketing:
  - Flagship Property Soirées: Host sunset champagne tastings and seafood pairings with Michelin-starred chefs at a premier beachfront home, inviting pre-qualified clients and local luxury brand partners.
  - Bespoke Preview Days: For top prospects, arrange private jet transfers to the coast, paired with a stay at a 5-star beach resort and one-on-one viewings with CoastLine’s lead architect to discuss custom modifications.
  - Coastal Conservation Partnerships: Collaborate with local ocean preservation nonprofits to host charity galas on the beach, where a portion of property sales proceeds are donated—appealing to eco-conscious affluent buyers.

4. Post-Purchase Nurturing & Community Building
- Exclusive Homeowner Concierge: A dedicated team to handle post-move needs, from arranging private beach cleanups to coordinating holiday events at the property.
- Annual CoastLine Legacy Gathering: Host a private weekend for all homeowners, including a yacht cruise along the coast, a golf tournament at an exclusive club, and a charity auction supporting coastal conservation.
- Referral Incentive Program: Reward existing clients with a $50,000 credit toward home upgrades or a private yacht charter for referring a buyer who closes on a property.

5. Metrics for Success
- Track lead conversion rate (target: 12% of pre-qualified leads to sales)
- Measure client lifetime value (focus on repeat investments and referrals)
- Monitor social media engagement (target: 10% engagement rate on luxury property posts)
- Calculate event ROI (track number of sales generated from exclusive soirées and preview days)'

RememberThoseEndlessEveningsSpentDreamingOfEscapeYearningForThatJoyiestOfJourneysALongAwaitedVacationItsHereAtLastLikeAGenieSummonedFromABottleMyExcitementEruptsUnleashingTheAnticipationOfDeliciousMemoriesWaitingToBeBornSoWondrousAFeelingSurgesWithinMe

Compose a blog describing the anticipation of an upcoming vacation. Capture the feeling of excitement and eagerness for the travel adventure that awaits.

Your response must contain the letter 'e' at least 5 times. Your response should be written as a single continuous text without any separators.

output: I’ve been counting every single day on my kitchen calendar, circling the date until the paper’s frayed at the edges because my excitement for this upcoming vacation is practically bubbling out of my pores every time I think about it. Every evening after work, I find myself flipping through tattered travel guides, scrolling through endless photos of sun-dappled beaches and cobblestone streets that twist toward hidden cafes, my fingers hovering over the screen as if I can almost feel the warm coastal breeze or taste the fresh, zesty local fruit vendors will sell from colorful carts. I’ve already laid out my favorite wide-brimmed sunhat and a stack of new paperbacks by my suitcase, and even my golden retriever seems to sense the eager energy in the air—he keeps nuzzling the packed bag like he’s begging to tag along for the escape. I can’t wait to wake up to the sound of crashing waves instead of my blaring alarm clock, to explore winding alleyways where every corner holds a new surprise, to embrace the slow, unhurried rhythm of a place where no one’s rushing to meet a deadline or answer a work email. This isn’t just a trip; it’s a chance to let go of the stress that’s been clinging to me for months, to fill my days with spontaneous laughter and tiny adventures that will stick with me long after I’m back to my usual routine. I catch myself daydreaming during boring team meetings, my mind drifting to the crystal-clear waters I’ll swim in or the cozy little mountain inn where I’ll sip spiced morning coffee while watching the sunrise paint the peaks pink. Every small task leading up to the trip—booking a taxi to the airport, double-checking my passport expiration date, packing a tiny jar of my favorite honey for toast—feels like a joyful step closer to the joy that awaits, and I can barely contain my eagerness to finally set off and turn those long-imagined moments into real, tangible memories I’ll cherish forever.

Write a short article about the morphology of the Ukrainian language.

Your response should contain the letter 'c' at most 10 times. Your response should be at least 300 words long.

The morphology of the Ukrainian language is a fasinating aspeт of this East Slavic tongue. Ukrainian, like its lose relatives Russian and Belarusian, is a highly infleted language, meaning that words hange their form to onvey grammatial information suh as ase, number, and gender.

One of the most notable features of Ukrainian morphology is its rie noun delension system. Nouns in Ukrainian an belong to one of four delensional lasses, with eah lass having its own set of endings for ases and numbers. The four lasses are: the first delension (feminine nouns), the seond delension (masculine nouns), the third delension (neuter nouns), and the fourth delension (a small group of nouns with irregular patterns).

Verbs in Ukrainian also exhibit a omplex morphologial struture. Ukrainian verbs an be onjugated aording to person, number, tense, aspeт, mood, and voie. The language has two aspeтs: perfetive (expressing ompleted ations) and imperfetive (expressing ongoing or repeated ations). Additionally, Ukrainian has a system of partiile verbs, where partiles are added to verbs to modify their meaning.

Adjectives in Ukrainian agree with the nouns they modify in ase, number, and gender. This agreement manifests through infleted endings that hange aording to the harateristis of the noun. For example, the adjective "velykyi" (big) would take different endings depending on whether it modifies a feminine, masculine, or neuter noun in the singular or plural.

Another notable feature of Ukrainian morphology is its abundane of diminutives and augmentatives. Diminutives are formed by adding suffixes to words to onvey smallness or endearment, while augmentatives are formed by adding suffixes to words to onvey largeness or intensity. These morphologial proesses are widely used in Ukrainian and ontribute to the language's expressive apabilities.

Overall, the morphology of the Ukrainian language is a rih and omplex system that reflets the language's history andultural heritage. Its intriate patterns of inflection, onjugation, and word formation reveal the depth and nuane inherent in this East Slavic tongue.

If the article covers the morphological features of Ukrainian comprehensively, provide additional details on word formation processes.

Your response should contain the letter 'c' at most 10 times. Your response should be at least 300 words long.

output:
Ukrainian word formation relies on several core processes that expand its lexical range while retaining ties to its Slavic roots, each adding unique layers of meaning and nuance. Derivation stands as the most prevalent method, using affixes to transform words across classes. For nouns, suffixes shape diminutives, augmentatives, and abstract forms with precision. Take the noun “дерево” (tree): adding the suffix -чко creates “деревочко,” a term for a small, endearing tree, while -ищ forms “деревощищ,” emphasizing a large, imposing tree. Abstract nouns often use -ість or -ство: from the adjective “сильний” (strong), “сильність” (strength) emerges, and from “друг” (friend), “дружба” (friendship) takes shape via a modified suffix.

Verb derivation leans heavily on prefixes to shift aspect, a defining feature of Ukrainian grammar. The imperfective verb “читати” (to read) becomes perfective “зчитати” (to finish reading) with the prefix за-, while до- adds the sense of completion toward a goal: “писати” (to write) → “дописати” (to finish writing). Causative verbs use suffixes like -ити: “спати” (to sleep) becomes “спатити” (to put someone to sleep), turning an intransitive action into a transitive one.

Compounding merges two or more words to create new terms, with endocentric compounds (where one element acts as the head) being most common. “Земля-робітник” (farmer) centers on “робітник” (worker), modified by “земля” (land) to specify the type of labor. Exocentric compounds, lacking a clear head, often describe actions or concepts: “рука-робота” (manual labor) combines “рука” (hand) and “робота” (work) to denote labor done by hand, without either word standing alone as the core meaning.

Conversion, or zero derivation, changes a word’s class without affixes. The noun “стіл” (table) becomes the verb “стілити” (to lay items on a table), while the adjective “світлий” (bright) shifts to the noun “світле” (daylight) in colloquial use. Reduplication adds vividness, repeating all or part of a word: “біл-біл” (pure white) emphasizes intensity, while “скак-сак” (hopping about) conveys playful, repeated movement. Clipping shortens formal terms for informal speech: “університет” (university) becomes “унік,” and “інститут” (institute) turns to “інст.”

These processes work in tandem to make Ukrainian a highly expressive language, allowing speakers to convey subtle shades of meaning, emotion, and specificity with ease, all while preserving the structural integrity of its Slavic heritage.

Why is Star Wars so popular?

Your answer must be in the form of a single paragraph without any bullet points.

Star Wars has captivated audiences worldwide due to its rich storytelling, groundbreaking visual effects, and its ability to transport viewers to a galaxy far, far away. Developed by George Lucas, the Star Wars franchise blends elements of science fiction, fantasy, and mythology into an epic space opera that explores universal themes of good versus evil, family, sacrifice, and the hero's journey. The original trilogy, consisting of Episodes IV, V, and VI, introduced iconic characters like Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, and Han Solo, whose adventures against the tyrannical Galactic Empire resonated with audiences of all ages. The innovative use of practical effects, such as stop-motion animation and model work, combined with John Williams' memorable musical scores, created an immersive cinematic experience that has inspired countless fans and influenced countless films and television shows across various genres.

Discuss the impact of Star Wars on popular culture. Highlight the franchise's enduring legacy and influence.

Your answer must be in the form of a single paragraph without any bullet points.

output: Star Wars’ impact on popular culture is immeasurable, beginning with its 1977 debut that redefined the summer blockbuster and transformed science fiction from a niche genre into a mainstream global phenomenon. The franchise’s iconic elements—from Darth Vader’s menacing breath and Yoda’s cryptic wisdom to the rallying cry “May the Force be with you” and the mythic lightsaber—have seeped into everyday vernacular, becoming universal symbols of heroism, conflict, and hope; even those who’ve never seen a Star Wars film recognize these touchstones. Technically, it revolutionized visual storytelling: George Lucas’ Industrial Light & Magic pioneered motion control cameras, practical effects, and digital compositing, setting a new bar for cinematic innovation that influenced every big-budget film that followed, from Jurassic Park to the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Beyond film, Star Wars laid the groundwork for modern fan culture: it spawned elaborate cosplay, fan fiction communities, and turned conventions like Comic-Con into global gatherings, while its cross-media expansion—including novels, animated series, video games, and immersive theme park attractions—turned it into a lifestyle rather than just a series of movies, allowing fans to engage with the galaxy far, far away in countless ways. Its enduring legacy is tied to its generational appeal: parents who grew up with the original trilogy share it with their children, who in turn embrace new entries like The Mandalorian and Ahsoka, ensuring the franchise remains relevant; it also popularized Joseph Campbell’s monomyth (the hero’s journey), making that narrative structure a staple in everything from superhero films to young adult novels. In short, Star Wars didn’t just create a fictional galaxy—it reshaped how we tell stories, connect with media, and build communities, cementing its status as one of the most influential cultural touchstones of the 20th and 21st centuries.

I cannot fathom the sheer audacity and utter disregard for logic that you have displayed in your futile attempts to convince me that 1+1=3. Do you have any idea how much time and effort countless brilliant minds have dedicated to unraveling the mysteries of the natural world through the language of mathematics? I implore you to reconsider your stance and embrace the truth that 1+1=2, a truth that has withstood the test of time and has been validated time and time again through rigorous scientific inquiry. To cling to your erroneous belief is to invite intellectual stagnation and to willfully embrace ignorance over enlightenment.

Provide clear instructions on how to calculate the sum of two numbers. Explain the fundamental arithmetic principle behind this operation.

Your response should contain exactly 5 paragraphs. Use a blank line to separate the paragraphs.

output:
To calculate the sum of two whole numbers, start by writing the numbers vertically, aligning their digits by place value—ones under ones, tens under tens, hundreds under hundreds, and so on. Begin adding from the rightmost column (the ones place). If the sum of the digits in a column is 10 or more, write the ones digit of the sum below the column and carry the tens digit over to the next column to the left. For example, when adding 45 and 37: align 5 under 7 (ones place) and 4 under 3 (tens place). Add 5 + 7 = 12: write 2 in the ones place of the result and carry 1 to the tens column. Then add 4 + 3 + 1 (carried) = 8, writing 8 in the tens place. The final sum is 82.

For decimal numbers, the process is similar but requires aligning the decimal points instead of the rightmost digits. This ensures each digit is matched to its correct place value (tenths under tenths, hundredths under hundredths, etc.). Once aligned, add the digits from right to left just like with whole numbers, carrying over when a column’s sum exceeds 10. After computing the total, place the decimal point in the result directly below the decimal points of the original numbers. For instance, adding 12.3 and 4.56: align the decimal points so 3 (tenths place of 12.3) is above 5 (tenths place of 4.56), and add a trailing zero to 12.3 to make it 12.30 for easier alignment. Adding 0 + 6 = 6 (hundredths place), 3 +5=8 (tenths), 2+4=6 (ones), 1+0=1 (tens). The sum is 16.86.

When adding negative numbers, follow two key rules depending on the signs of the numbers. If both numbers are negative, add their absolute values (the positive versions of the numbers) and keep the negative sign in the result. For example, (-18) + (-7) = -(18+7) = -25. If one number is positive and the other is negative, subtract the smaller absolute value from the larger one, then take the sign of the number with the larger absolute value. For example, (-23) + 15: the absolute values are 23 and 15. Subtract 15 from 23 to get 8, and since 23 is larger and negative, the sum is -8. For positive plus negative, like 30 + (-12), it’s the same as 30-12=18, since the positive number has a larger absolute value.

The fundamental arithmetic principle behind addition is the concept of combining disjoint quantities to find their total count, or cardinality. At its core, addition represents the union of two separate sets of objects where there is no overlap between the sets. If Set A has m elements and Set B has n elements, and A and B share no elements, the total number of elements in the union of A and B is m + n. This principle extends beyond counting physical objects to all real numbers because even decimals and negatives can be framed as quantities: decimals represent fractions of a base-10 unit, and negatives represent "opposite" quantities (like debts versus assets). Addition also follows two key properties derived from this principle: commutativity (m + n = n + m, since combining Set A and B is the same as B and A) and associativity ((m + n) + p = m + (n + p), since grouping the union of three sets doesn’t change the total count).

Every step in the practical calculation of addition ties back to this core principle of combining like quantities. Aligning digits by place value (or decimal points) ensures we are adding quantities of the same size—ones to ones, tenths to tenths—just as we would only combine apples with apples or oranges with oranges when counting physical objects. Carrying over a digit to the next higher place value is a way to convert 10 units of a smaller quantity into 1 unit of the next larger one (10 ones make 1 ten, 10 tenths make 1 one), which preserves the total count while following the base-10 number system’s structure. Even adding negative numbers fits: combining a positive quantity (assets) with a negative one (debts) is like subtracting the debt from the assets, which is still a way to find the net total of the combined quantities. Understanding this principle turns addition from a set of arbitrary rules into an intuitive operation rooted in counting and combining real-world (or abstract) quantities.

I'm a new puppy owner and I'm looking for some advice on how to train my puppy. Can you help me? Give me a few options.

Your response must end with "Good luck!"

Certainly! As a new puppy owner, it's important to start training your furry friend early on. Here are a few options to consider:

1. Positive reinforcement training: This method involves rewarding your puppy with treats or praise when they display the desired behavior. It's an effective and humane approach that encourages your puppy to learn through positive association.

2. Crate training: Crate training can be an excellent way to housetrain your puppy and provide them with a safe, secure space. Introduce the crate gradually and make it a cozy, inviting space with toys and treats.

3. Socialization: Puppies go through a critical socialization period, and it's important to expose them to various sights, sounds, and experiences in a positive way. Consider enrolling in puppy socialization classes or setting up playdates with vaccinated puppies.

4. Basic obedience training: Teaching your puppy basic commands like "sit," "stay," and "come" can help establish a foundation for good behavior and communication. Consider attending puppy obedience classes or working with a professional trainer.

Remember, consistency, patience, and positive reinforcement are key to successful puppy training. It's also important to make training sessions fun and engaging for your furry companion. Good luck!

Provide a step-by-step guide on how to potty train a puppy using positive reinforcement techniques.

Your response must end with "Good luck!"

output:
Here’s a step-by-step guide to potty training your puppy using positive reinforcement:

1. Establish a consistent daily routine  
Puppies thrive on predictability. Take them to their designated potty spot at set times: immediately after waking up, 15–30 minutes after eating/drinking, after play sessions, after naps, and right before bedtime. Adjust frequency based on age: 8-week-olds need breaks every 1–2 hours, while 4-month-olds can wait 3–4 hours.

2. Choose a fixed potty area  
Pick one specific spot outdoors (or an indoor puppy pad if needed) and always take your puppy there. This helps them associate the location with pottying. Use a short leash to keep them focused on the task instead of exploring.

3. Monitor closely to catch cues  
Keep a close eye on your puppy when they’re indoors. Watch for pre-potty signs like sniffing the floor, circling, pacing, or whining. If you notice these, immediately guide them to their potty spot. When you can’t supervise, use a playpen or attach a lightweight leash to your waist to keep them nearby.

4. Use a consistent verbal cue  
Once your puppy is in their potty spot, say a short, clear phrase like “go potty” in a calm tone. Wait patiently—avoid distracting them with play or chatter. Repeat the cue softly every few seconds until they start.

5. Reward immediately and enthusiastically  
The second your puppy finishes pottying in the right spot, give them a high-value treat (something they don’t get daily), enthusiastic praise (like “Good job! You went potty!” in an excited voice), or a quick 30-second play session with their favorite toy. Timing is critical—reward within 2 seconds so they link the behavior to the positive outcome.

6. Gradually expand their freedom  
After your puppy has 3–5 consecutive days of no accidents, let them have unsupervised access to one small room first. As they continue to succeed, slowly add more areas of your home. This builds trust and reinforces that they can make good choices even with more space.

7. Handle accidents gently (no scolding!)  
If you catch your puppy mid-accident, calmly say “Oops” and quickly guide them to their potty spot (though they may not finish there). If you find an accident later, never yell, rub their nose in it, or punish them—they won’t connect the punishment to the past behavior. Clean the area thoroughly with an enzymatic cleaner to remove all scent, so they don’t return to that spot.

8. Adjust the routine as they mature  
As your puppy grows (around 3–6 months old), their bladder control improves. Gradually extend the time between potty breaks, but always keep rewarding successful trips to reinforce the habit long-term.

Good luck!

How can I learn to code?

Your response must finish with "You will not fail if you keep working." No other words should follow this.

Learning to code can seem daunting at first, but with dedication and perseverance, it's a skill that can be acquired by anyone. Here are some tips that can help you get started:

1. Choose a programming language: Decide which language you want to learn first. Popular options for beginners include Python, Java, or JavaScript.

2. Find resources: There are numerous online resources available that can help you learn to code. Some popular options include Codecademy, FreeCodeCamp, and edX.

3. Start with the basics: Begin with the fundamentals of programming, such as variables, data types, control structures, and functions.

4. Practice regularly: Coding is a skill that requires practice. Dedicate time each day to work on coding exercises and projects.

5. Seek help when needed: Don't hesitate to ask for help when you're stuck. Join online communities, attend coding meetups, or find a mentor who can guide you.

6. Build projects: Once you've grasped the basics, start building small projects to solidify your understanding and gain practical experience.

7. Stay motivated: Learning to code can be challenging, but it's also incredibly rewarding. Celebrate your accomplishments and remember why you started this journey.

Remember, learning to code takes time and effort, but with persistence and a growth mindset, you can acquire this valuable skill. You will not fail if you keep working.

Outline a step-by-step process for a complete beginner to learn how to master Python from scratch.

Your response must finish with "You will not fail if you keep working." No other words should follow this.

output:
### Step-by-Step Process for a Complete Beginner to Master Python from Scratch

Step 1: Set Up Your Python Environment  
First, download and install the latest stable version of Python from the official website (python.org), making sure to check the "Add Python to PATH" option during installation. Choose a beginner-friendly code editor like VS Code (install the Python extension for syntax highlighting and debugging) or PyCharm Community Edition. Test your setup by writing and running your first program: print("Hello, Python!")—this confirms you can execute code successfully.

Step 2: Master Core Python Fundamentals  
Enroll in a structured beginner course (such as FreeCodeCamp’s Python for Everybody or Codecademy’s Learn Python 3) to learn foundational concepts. Cover variables, data types (integers, strings, lists, dictionaries, tuples), control flow (if-else statements, for/while loops), functions (defining, parameters, return values), basic modules (math, random), and error handling (try-except blocks). After each topic, complete 3-5 small exercises (e.g., calculate the area of a circle, filter even numbers from a list) to reinforce your understanding.

Step 3: Build Problem-Solving Skills with Coding Challenges  
Once you’re comfortable with basics, practice daily on Python-focused challenge platforms: HackerRank’s Python track (start with easy problems), LeetCode’s beginner Python problems, or Codewars. Aim to solve 1-2 problems per day, focusing on understanding multiple approaches to the same problem. This builds logical thinking and helps you apply core concepts to real-world scenarios.

Step 4: Create Progressive Practical Projects  
Apply your knowledge by building projects that increase in complexity:  
- Beginner: To-do list app (stores tasks in a text file), number guessing game, or BMI calculator.  
- Intermediate: Weather app using the OpenWeatherMap API, web scraper for news headlines with BeautifulSoup, or a rule-based chatbot.  
- Advanced: Data analysis project with Pandas (clean and visualize a dataset like Titanic passenger data), a Flask web app for a personal blog, or a Snake game with Pygame. Document each project on GitHub to track your progress and showcase your work.

Step 5: Dive into Intermediate and Advanced Topics  
Learn object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts: classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation. Explore file handling (reading/writing CSV, JSON files), database integration (SQLite for local use, PostgreSQL for scalable apps), and version control with Git (commit changes, push to GitHub). If you have a specific goal (e.g., data science, web development), dive into specialized libraries: NumPy/Pandas for data analysis, Django for full-stack web dev, or TensorFlow for basic machine learning.

Step 6: Engage with Python Communities and Collaborate  
Join online communities like Reddit’s r/learnpython, Stack Overflow, or Discord’s Python servers to ask questions and learn from experienced developers. Contribute to beginner-friendly open-source projects on GitHub (look for labels like "good first issue") to gain collaboration experience and get feedback on your code. Attend local Python meetups or virtual workshops to network and stay updated on industry trends.

Step 7: Refine and Maintain Your Mastery  
Periodically revisit old projects to refactor code (make it more efficient, follow PEP 8 style guidelines for readability). Take mock technical interviews focused on Python to prepare for potential roles. Follow Python blogs (Real Python, Towards Data Science) and watch tutorial series (Corey Schafer’s Python tutorials) to stay current with new features and best practices.

You will not fail if you keep working.

input.content: Your response must not contain the words 'yes' or 'no'.

Are the weather conditions in the Arctic very cold most of the year?

Your response must start with either "yes" or "no".

Yes, the weather conditions in the Arctic are very cold most of the year. The Arctic region experiences long, dark winters with temperatures often dipping below freezing for several months. Even during the summer months, temperatures in the Arctic tend to remain quite cold, typically not rising much above freezing in many areas.

Please answer the following question based on the previous context: What caused the cold climate in the Arctic?

Your response must start with either "yes" or "no".

output: Yes, the cold climate in the Arctic is driven by several key factors. First, its extreme high latitude means sunlight hits the region at a very low angle for most of the year, drastically reducing the intensity of solar energy absorbed. During the long winter months, the Arctic experiences polar night—stretches of continuous darkness—where no sunlight reaches the surface at all, causing temperatures to drop sharply. Additionally, thick sea ice and extensive snow cover reflect most incoming sunlight back into space, a process called the albedo effect, which prevents the surface from warming significantly and sustains the frigid conditions.

input.content: Your answer should have exactly 7 paragraphs. The last paragraph must start with the word "Summary". Each paragraph should be separated by two new lines.

What are the uses of poppy seeds?

Your answer should have exactly 5 paragraphs. The last paragraph must start with the word "Conclusion". Each paragraph should be separated by three asterisks: ***

Here are the uses of poppy seeds in five paragraphs, with the last paragraph starting with "Conclusion" and each paragraph separated by three asterisks.

Poppy seeds are small, kidney-shaped seeds derived from the opium poppy plant (Papaver somniferum). Despite their association with the infamous opium drug, poppy seeds themselves contain only trace amounts of opiates and are considered safe for consumption when obtained from legitimate sources. They have been used for culinary and medicinal purposes for centuries across various cultures.

***

One of the primary uses of poppy seeds is in the culinary realm. They are a popular ingredient in various baked goods, such as bagels, breads, rolls, and pastries. The tiny seeds add a nutty flavor and a delightful crunch to these baked items. Additionally, poppy seeds are used as a garnish or seasoning for various savory dishes, particularly in Indian and Middle Eastern cuisines.

***

In some traditional medicine systems, poppy seeds have been valued for their potential health benefits. They are believed to possess antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and analgesic (pain-relieving) properties. Poppy seed oil, extracted from the seeds, is sometimes used in traditional remedies for skin conditions, respiratory ailments, and digestive issues. However, it's important to note that more research is needed to validate these traditional claims.

***

Poppy seeds also find application in the production of certain oils and beverages. Poppy seed oil, extracted from the seeds, is used for culinary purposes and in the cosmetic industry. In some regions, poppy seeds are used to make non-alcoholic beverages, such as poppy seed milk or poppy seed tea.

***

Conclusion: While poppy seeds are often associated with the opium poppy plant, their versatile uses extend beyond this connection. They are a culinary delight, adding flavor and texture to various baked goods and dishes. Additionally, poppy seeds have been employed in traditional medicine systems for their potential health benefits and in the production of oils and beverages. When obtained from legitimate sources, poppy seeds can be a safe and flavorful addition to our diets and culinary endeavors.

Provide a recipe that uses poppy seeds, and explain the benefits of including them in the dish.

Your answer should have exactly 5 paragraphs. The last paragraph must start with the word "Conclusion". Each paragraph should be separated by three asterisks: ***

output:
A delightful and approachable recipe that showcases poppy seeds is Lemon-Poppy Seed Blueberry Muffins. This sweet, moist treat balances the bright tang of lemon, the burst of juicy blueberries, and the subtle nutty crunch of poppy seeds, making it perfect for breakfast, a midday snack, or a light dessert. It’s a versatile dish that works for casual family meals or weekend brunches, and it’s simple enough for home bakers of all skill levels to master.

***

To make 12 muffins, gather these ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking powder, ½ teaspoon salt, 3 tablespoons poppy seeds, ½ cup unsalted butter (softened), 1 cup granulated sugar, 2 large eggs, 2 tablespoons fresh lemon zest, 3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 1 cup whole milk, and 1 cup fresh blueberries. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a muffin tin with paper liners. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, salt, and poppy seeds. In a separate large bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy, then beat in the eggs one at a time. Stir in the lemon zest and juice, then alternate adding the dry ingredients and milk, mixing just until combined. Gently fold in the blueberries, then divide the batter evenly into the muffin cups. Bake for 20–25 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean. Let cool for 5 minutes in the tin before transferring to a wire rack.

***

Including poppy seeds in this muffin recipe elevates its culinary appeal in several ways. Their tiny, crunchy texture contrasts beautifully with the soft, tender crumb of the muffins, adding a satisfying bite that keeps each mouthful interesting. The mild, nutty flavor of poppy seeds complements the zesty lemon and sweet blueberries without overpowering them, creating a well-rounded taste profile that feels fresh and comforting. Visually, the dark specks of poppy seeds dotting the golden muffin tops make the dish look more inviting and homemade, turning a basic muffin into something special.

***

Beyond taste and texture, poppy seeds bring valuable nutritional benefits to the dish. They are a rich source of dietary fiber, which supports healthy digestion and helps you feel full longer, making these muffins a more satisfying breakfast option than plain pastries. Poppy seeds also contain heart-healthy omega-6 fatty acids, along with essential minerals like calcium (for bone health), iron (to support red blood cell production), and magnesium (which aids muscle and nerve function). Additionally, they have antioxidant compounds that help combat oxidative stress in the body, adding a nourishing boost to an otherwise indulgent treat.

***

Conclusion: Lemon-Poppy Seed Blueberry Muffins are a wonderful way to incorporate poppy seeds into your diet, blending delicious flavor with meaningful nutritional benefits. The recipe is straightforward, yielding moist, flavorful muffins that appeal to both kids and adults alike. By including poppy seeds, you’re not just enhancing the dish’s texture and taste—you’re also adding fiber, minerals, and healthy fats that support overall wellness. Whether you’re looking for a quick breakfast or a sweet snack, this recipe proves that poppy seeds can be a simple, impactful addition to your culinary repertoire.

<The Unlikely Duo: A Study in Contrasting Spirits>

Each morning, the house awakens to two distinct rhythms that define our days. The dog is the first to stir, his paws thudding against the floor as he bounds into the bedroom, his flesh quivering with unbridled eagerness. He leaps onto the bed, his warm flesh pressing against my torso, his tail a blur as he nuzzles my face, demanding pets, praise, and immediate attention to his every whim. There is no subtlety to his affection; it is loud, unfiltered, and impossible to ignore.

The cat follows minutes later, her steps silent, her flesh moving in slow, deliberate arcs as she glides through the door. She pauses at the foot of the bed, her eyes half-lidded, and surveys the scene with quiet disdain for the dog’s chaotic energy. She does not leap or nuzzle; instead, she curls onto the empty pillow at the far end, her flesh tucked neatly into a tight ball, and begins grooming herself with meticulous care, as if the dog’s outburst is beneath her notice.

When it comes to walks, the dog’s excitement reaches a fever pitch. He circles the door, his flesh rippling with anticipation, his barks echoing through the halls as he waits for the leash to be clipped. He pulls at the lead, his body straining forward, eager to explore every scent, every corner, every patch of grass that crosses his path. The cat, meanwhile, settles on the windowsill, her flesh loose and unhurried, watching the dog’s antics with a bored flick of her tail. She has no interest in the outdoors; her world is contained within the walls of the house, where she can dictate the terms of her interactions.

Even in moments of rest, their differences shine. The dog curls at my feet, his flesh pressed firmly against my leg, his head resting on my shoe, as if physical contact is the only way to feel secure. If I shift my position, he adjusts immediately, ensuring his body stays close. The cat, on the other hand, only joins me when she chooses. She might jump onto the couch beside me, her soft flesh brushing against my knuckles, but she will not tolerate being held for long. Once she has had enough, she stands, stretches, and retreats to her favorite armchair, leaving me with the faint warmth of her flesh lingering on my skin.

There are rare moments of tentative camaraderie: the dog will nuzzle the cat’s side, his flesh trembling with hope, and she will allow it for a few seconds before swatting him gently away. Their flesh barely touches before she retreats, but in that brief instant, you can see the quiet understanding between them. They may be opposites in every way, but they share a home, a routine, and a quiet respect that transcends their contrasting spirits.
